query:
SELECT 
  c.id,
  c.name as category_name,
  COUNT(p.id) as product_count
FROM categories c
LEFT JOIN products p ON c.id = p.categoryId
WHERE c.id IN (8, 9, 10, 11)
GROUP BY c.id, c.name
ORDER BY c.id;
